data.lyric:
[ti:How The Game Go]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]How The Game Go - Rod Wave
[00:05.39]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Ryder Johnson/Danny Snodgrass/Adawg
[00:10.78]D**n ryder
[00:11.89]Uh stay in my lane play the game how the game go
[00:15.00]Stayed the same these n***as changed I don't change though
[00:17.85]We in the booth back to back let that pain go
[00:20.70]We in them coupes back to back black Durangos
[00:24.04]Slide down this block let them things go
[00:26.50]They get to drummin' ain't no running from a Draco
[00:29.33]F**k a hater we get paper that's a case closed
[00:32.18]Play the game how the game go
[00:34.90]I play the game that was taught to me
[00:36.96]I fry the beef that was brought to me
[00:39.04]These n***as hating throwing salt on me
[00:41.17]My mouth be blinging we can't talk
[00:42.62]For free no he don't talk for cheap
[00:44.60]Don't know who to trust don't know
[00:46.01]Who I could believe in
[00:47.31]Don't know who to trust every night he fighting demons
[00:50.04]I never gave a f**k I got me so
[00:52.09]I don't need them
[00:53.03]Never gave it up I kept strivin' and reachin'
[00:56.16]Now my mama happy new watch is a
[00:57.95]Patek pistol in his jacket
[00:59.33]Still 'bout action reach
[01:00.25]I let you have it put that on my granny
[01:02.05]Grrah
[01:02.52]Remember when I told 'em
[01:03.58]I was him they all was laughing
[01:05.20]And now done millions and got brand
[01:06.57]New whips and brand new mansions
[01:08.09]Now I walk 'round this b***h my neck
[01:09.43]And wrist be full of carats
[01:10.77]I just was homeless sleeping
[01:12.07]On my cousin blow-up mattress
[01:13.68]That s**t was tragic it be tragic 
[01:15.45]How these f**k n***as be hatin' and s**t
[01:17.23]But I was made for this s**t yeah
[01:19.47]Uh stay in my lane play the game how the game go
[01:22.81]Stayed the same these n***as changed
[01:24.44]I don't change though
[01:25.68]We in the booth back to back let that pain go
[01:28.44]We in them coupes back to back black Durangos
[01:31.88]Slide down this block let them things go
[01:34.17]They get to drummin' ain't no running from a Draco
[01:37.10]F**k a hater we get paper that's a case closed
[01:39.97]Play the game how the game go
[01:44.12]I play the game how the game go
[01:46.19]I play the game yeah
[01:48.33]I play the game how the game go
[01:51.86]I just go with the flow of everything in life
data.trans:
[ti:How The Game Go]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.39]//
[00:10.78]//
[00:11.89]我安守本分 玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[00:15.00]始终如一 这些家伙改变了 可我没有变过
[00:17.85]我们呆在录音室里 相互支持 赶走痛苦
[00:20.70]我们坐着豪华轿车 背靠背 黑色越野车
[00:24.04]在这个街区兜风 让烦恼烟消云散
[00:26.50]他们必须勇敢战斗 不能在子弹下逃走
[00:29.33]干掉了仇家 我们吃了官司 那案子平安了结了
[00:32.18]玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[00:34.90]我玩着这游戏 很久以前就学会如何战斗
[00:36.96]冲我而来的争斗 我都完美解决了
[00:39.04]这些恨我的家伙对我百般阻挠
[00:41.17]我的话价值千金 我不能免费跟你交流
[00:42.62]他不会随便开个价就跟你交谈了
[00:44.60]不知道有谁可以信任 不知道
[00:46.01]我有谁可以相信
[00:47.31]不知道有谁可以信任 每晚他都在跟恶魔搏斗
[00:50.04]我从不在乎 我可以自己挺我自己
[00:52.09]我不需要他们
[00:53.03]从未放弃 我不懈拼搏奋斗
[00:56.16]现在我的母亲很是快乐 新手表是
[00:57.95]百达翡丽 他外套里装着手枪
[00:59.33]仍然还想行动 来吧
[01:00.25]放马过来 你根本不是对手
[01:02.05]//
[01:02.52]记得我那时候跟他们说
[01:03.58]我不是平凡角色 他们全都嘲笑我
[01:05.20]现在我赚了百万 提了几辆新车
[01:06.57]买了几栋新的别墅
[01:08.09]现在我美人在怀 脖子
[01:09.43]手腕挂满钻石珠宝
[01:10.77]我曾经四处流浪 睡在我
[01:12.07]表哥破旧的床垫上
[01:13.68]那可真是悲剧 太可悲了
[01:15.45]这些家伙怎么想的来找我做对手
[01:17.23]但我天生就不惧威慑
[01:19.47]我安分守己 玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[01:22.81]始终如一 这些家伙改变了
[01:24.44]可我没有变过
[01:25.68]我们呆在录音室里 相互支持 赶走痛苦
[01:28.44]我们坐着豪华轿车 背靠背 黑色越野车
[01:31.88]在这个街区兜风 将烦恼一扫而空
[01:34.17]他们必须勇敢战斗 不能在子弹下逃走
[01:37.10]干掉了仇家 我们吃了官司 那案子平安了结了
[01:39.97]玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[01:44.12]我玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[01:46.19]我玩着这游戏
[01:48.33]我玩着这游戏 游戏是如何进行的
[01:51.86]我这一生都只是顺其自然罢了
